{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=2011 |Team=South Florida Bulls |Image=Usfbulls newlogo.png |Conference=Big East Conference |ShortConference=Big East |Record=5â7 |ConfRecord=1â6 |CoachRank= |APRank= |BCSRank= |HeadCoach= [[Skip Holtz]] |OffCoach= Todd Fitch |DefCoach= [[Mark Snyder]] |OScheme= |DScheme= |StadiumArena=[[Raymond James Stadium]] (65,890 grass) |Champion= |BowlTourney= |BowlTourneyResult= }} {{2011 Big East football standings}} The '''2011 South Florida Bulls football team''' will represent the [[University of South Florida]] (USF) in the [[2011 NCAA Division I FBS football season]]. The [[South Florida Bulls football|USF Bulls]] will play their home games at [[Raymond James Stadium]] in [[Tampa, FL]]. The 2011 college football season will be the 15th season overall for the Bulls, and their seventh season in the [[Big East Conference]]. This will be the second season with [[Skip Holtz]] as the head coach at USF. ==Schedule== {{CFB Schedule Start|time=|rank=|ranklink=|rankyear=2011|tv=|attend=yes}} {{CFB Schedule Entry | date =
